trans-unit.target: 受有任何结界于其上的生物均不可攻击或阻挡。

trans-unit.resname: EXO·125 | Song of Serenity | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Heartwood brings peace in great symphonies where dryads conduct the trees through every note.
trans-unit.target: 哈特森在树灵的指挥下奏出音符，谱成了平和的交响曲。

trans-unit.target: CARDNAME进场时，上面有两个 +1/+1指示物。 o2，自CARDNAME上移去一个 +1/+1指示物：在目标生物上放置一个 +1/+1指示物。 o2，自你所操控的任何生物上移去一个 +1/+1指示物：在CARDNAME上放置一个 +1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.target: 适者生存

trans-unit.source: o\nG, Choose and discard a creature card: Search your library for a creature card, reveal that card to all players, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your library afterwards.
trans-unit.target: oG，选择弃掉一张生物牌：自你的牌库中搜寻一张生物牌，展示这张牌给所有的玩家，再将它放入你的手牌中。之后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: Wood Elves
trans-unit.target: 林木妖精

trans-unit.resname: EXO·130 | Wood Elves | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, search your library for a forest card and put that forest into play. Shuffle your library afterwards.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，在你的牌库中搜寻一张树林牌并将之放置进场。之后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: Secure in the embrace of wood, they want no part of Eladamri's war.
trans-unit.target: 在林木的卫护下，他们无意参与艾拉达力的战争。

trans-unit.resname: EXO·131 | Coat of Arms | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Coat of Arms
trans-unit.target: 武装外衣

trans-unit.resname: EXO·131 | Coat of Arms | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Each creature gets +1/+1 for each other creature in play of the same creature type. (For example, if there are three Goblins in play, each of them gets +2/+2.)
trans-unit.target: 每有一个同样生物种类的其他生物在场，则该生物获得 +1/+1。(例如，若有三个妖精在场上，则每个妖精获得 +2/+2。)

trans-unit.resname: EXO·131 | Coat of Arms | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Hup, two, three, four,\nDunno how to count no more."\n—Mogg march
trans-unit.target: 「哈，二，三，四， 我们知道怎么数。」 ～莫葛行军口令

trans-unit.source: "In Barrin's name!" cried Lyna as Hanna's sword passed through her, "Ertai sends word that the portal is open—but not for long!"
trans-unit.target: 「我以巴林之名而来！」当哈娜的剑直刺而来时，莱娜大喊，「尔泰要我告诉你们，时空通道已经开了～但是开不了多久！」

trans-unit.source: "My medicine bag and I have treated countless wounds and illnesses. But never have I seen so many made so sick for so long. We will *never* eat Squee's cooking again."\n—Orim, journal
trans-unit.target: 「我和我的医药袋治过数不清的伤痛与疾病；但长久以来，我还没有看过那么多人生那么重的病。我们再也不会吃斯奎煮的东西了。」 ～欧琳，日志

trans-unit.source: Thopter Squadron
trans-unit.target: 振翼机中队

trans-unit.resname: EXO·140 | Thopter Squadron | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
Flying
CARDNAME comes into play with three +1/+1 counters on it.
o1, Remove a +1/+1 counter from CARDNAME: Put a Thopter token into play. Treat this token as a 1/1 artifact creature with flying. Play this ability as a sorcery.
o1, Sacrifice a Thopter: Put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME. Play this ability as a sorcery.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 CARDNAME进场时，上面有三个 +1/+1指示物。 o1，自CARDNAME上移去一个 +1/+1指示物：放置一个振翼机衍生物进场。将此衍生物视为1/1，具飞行异能的神器生物。将此异能视为巫术使用。 o1，牺牲一个振翼机：放置一个 +1/+1指示物在CARDNAME上。将此异能视为巫术使用。

trans-unit.source: CARDNAME counts as a Licid.\no1, oc\nT: CARDNAME loses this ability and becomes a creature enchantment that reads "Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and counts as an artifact" instead of any other type of permanent. Move CARDNAME onto target creature. You may pay o1 to end this effect.
trans-unit.target: 将CARDNAME视为立吸怪。 o1，ocT：CARDNAME失去此异能，并由生物成为一个生物结界，且含有以下规则叙述：「受此结界的生物得 +1/+1并视为神器」。将CARDNAME移至目标生物上。你可以支付o1以中止此效应。
